tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE advocacy_campaigns (
  campaign_id INT, 
  campaign_name VARCHAR(255), 
  policy_changes TEXT, 
  public_awareness BOOLEAN, 
  community_engagement INT
);

CREATE TABLE advocacy_campaigns (
    campaign_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    policy_changes TEXT,
    public_awareness BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    community_engagement INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE campaign_impact (
    impact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT NOT NULL,
    policy_id INT NOT NULL,
    awareness_id INT NOT NULL,
    engagement_id INT NOT NULL,
    impact_date DATE,
    impact_score INT
);
CREATE TABLE AdvocacyCampaigns (campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY, campaign_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, start_date DATE, end_date DATE, impact_description TEXT);
CREATE TABLE PolicyChanges (change_id INT PRIMARY KEY, policy_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, change_date DATE, change_description TEXT);
CREATE TABLE PublicAwareness (awareness_id INT PRIMARY KEY, awareness_topic VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, awareness_date DATE, awareness_description TEXT);
CREATE TABLE CommunityEngagement (engagement_id INT PRIMARY KEY, community_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, engagement_date DATE, engagement_description TEXT);

CREATE TABLE AdvocacyMetrics (metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY, campaign_id INT, change_id INT, awareness_id INT, engagement_id INT, impact_score FLOAT, FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES AdvocacyCampaigns(campaign_id), FOREIGN KEY (change_id) REFERENCES PolicyChanges(change_id), FOREIGN KEY (awareness_id) REFERENCES PublicAwareness(awareness_id), FOREIGN KEY (engagement_id) REFERENCES CommunityEngagement(engagement_id));
